description: Recommendations addressing social risk factors that may impact patient care and outcomes.

recommendations.description: Provide medications in sealed blister packs via a home medication delivery service due to transportation needs, mobility restrictions, and APS concerns.

citation.quote: A wheelchair van has been scheduled for pick-up today at 4:00 PM to transport the patient home.

recommendations.description: Instruct patient and IHSS worker to bring blister packs to primary care appointments to ensure medications are being delivered and taken as prescribed.

citation.quote: SW contacted the patient’s IHSS social worker to inform them of the patient’s return home and requested the resumption of IHSS services
